attributes.action: Urge  Electorial Commission to investigate  Scottish  Referendum result.
attributes.background:
Investigation into GE fraud casts doubt on the Scottish Referendum result. 
Witnesses say count was unlawful, researchers  doubt  the  postal vote result, evidence shows 'Yes' votes being placed in the 'No' pile. 
The Electorial Commission refused to investigate. Urge them to investigate now.

rejection.details: The Electoral Commission is independent of the Government and Parliament.
